I guess I'll be the first to comment.  You run the Nero-8.3.2.1_all_update and after that it'll just install the whole Nero Suite for you:

Nero StartSmart
NeroBurningRom
NeroVision
NeroBackItUp
NeroCoverDesigner
NeroWaveEditor
NeroSoundTrax
NeroShowTime
NeroMediaHome
NeroRecode
NeroPhotoSnap
NeroBurnRights
NeroImageDrive
NeroCDDVDSpeed
NeroDriveSpeed
NeroInfoTool
NeroRescueAgent
NeroBurn
NeroMediaStreaming
NeroCopyGadget
NeroToolbar

Doesn't ask for a serial or let you choose what you want just installs the whole damn thing.  Didn't even tell me to restart my computer.  If I run into any problems I will post here.
So is this activated already?
Yes it is activated.  And so far I have not had any problems.
